alert.note: Alert for Jefferson (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 11:47AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...FREEZING RAIN WILL AFFECT FAR NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON COUNTY... At 1144 AM EST, an area of freezing rain was approaching Jefferson county, and this area will move into the county shortly afternoon. Temperatures have risen above freezing across most of the county, including locations south and east of Watertown. However, temperatures remain below freezing across far northwestern portions of Jefferson County near the St. Lawrence River. Far northwestern Jefferson County can expect a period of freezing rain early this afternoon before temperatures rise above freezing later this afternoon. Locations impacted include... Clayton, Wellesley Island State Park, Cedar Point State Park, Redwood, Kring Point State Park, Alexandria Bay, Theresa, Cape Vincent, Chaumont, Three Mile Bay, Millen Bay, Grindstone, Fishers Landing, La Fargeville, Perch Lake, Point Peninsula, Plessis, Oxbow, Depauville and Muskellunge Lake. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 49 and 52. The freezing rain may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.
